name: pantheon-systems/terminus-rsync-plugin
description: Rsync - Terminus Plugin that provides a quick shortcut for rsync-ing files to and from a Pantheon site.

scripts.install-bats: if [ ! -f bin/bats ] ; then git clone https://github.com/sstephenson/bats.git; mkdir -p $HOME/bin; bats/install.sh $HOME; fi
scripts.install-phpcs: mkdir -p phpcs && cd phpcs && COMPOSER_BIN_DIR=../vendor/bin composer require squizlabs/php_codesniffer
